Texts.Eng: Bring the ^orange;Fission Reactor^reset; to the scientist at the ^orange;Science Outpost^reset;
Great! As thanks: This ^green;contract^reset; will allow you to recruit a unique hired crewmember! Oh, and this ^green;tech^reset;.

You can generate a lot of power with a ^orange;Fission Reactor^reset; in your lab. Show you can make one using your ^orange;Power Station^reset; and you can have this ^green;crew contract^reset;. I don't have room for crew on my ship anyhow.
